title: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I was wondering if it would be possible to free up this name (the accounts banned im pretty sure cuz it says its not available when i try to get a name change from the store) if not its cool but i also wanna ask why if a account is banned the account name wont free up like normally 

thx, Sinn <3

replies.body: Hey there, we can't manually take off names because they're all protected by the[ summoner name clean up](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-).  You'll have to keep an eye out to see when it becomes available.
but it says that the accounts likely banned and that it wont become available
It's a third party site, we can't support the authenticity of that.  Even if an account is banned, though, it's still protected by the summoner name protection.  Let me know if that clears things up!
